scripts.add:client: cd client && npm run reset $* && cd -
scripts.add:server: cd server && npm run reset $* && cd -
scripts.add: npm run add:client $* && npm run add:server $*
scripts.dev:server: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test && cd -
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run test && cd -
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint && cd -
scripts.lint:client: cd client && npm run lint && cd -
scripts.stylelint: cd client && npm run stylelint && cd -
scripts.prettier:client: cd client && npm run prettier && cd -
scripts.prettier:server: cd server && npm run prettier && cd -
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier:client && npm run prettier:server
